radiographic_examinations.findings: Multiple cortical tubers and subependymal nodules, enhancing 2-cm-diameter pineal region mass isointense to gray matter on T1-weighted and hypointense on T2-weighted sequences.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The mass was shown to enlarge slightly on follow-up MR images.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Gross-total resection of the tumor, no evidence of recurrent tumor.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Currently, 1.5 years after surgery, the patient is neurologically intact without MR imaging evidence of recurrent tumor.
